title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5400.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5400.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant
to this Part. (b) The fee
for photocopies not exceeding 9 by 14 inches is: (1)
10 cents a page for up to 50 pages; or
(2)
the cost paid by the
corporation to a commercial photocopying business for more than 50
pages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5400.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
